welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Montclair, where history and modernity meet. Known for its vibrant arts scene and picturesque parks, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, used for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, primarily used for United Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require occasional reconnection.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves as the hub for all commercial flights and features a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and charter flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves mainly domestic flights for American Airlines, Delta, and Southwest.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves mainly domestic flights for Air Canada, JetBlue, and United.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves mainly domestic and international flights for Delta and WestJet.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: Serves mainly domestic and international flights for American Airlines and Delta.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: International flights for British Airways and other airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Domestic and international flights for American Airlines

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport
